title: (Completed) WTB 1910 T212 175 subjects-4 remaining back slogans
author: scottbuda

posts.post_title: (Completed) WTB 1910 T212 175 subjects-4 remaining back slogans
posts.post_content:
Hi, I’m looking to complete my 1910 T212 Obak 175 back slogan run. I need 4 more. Willing to buy raw or graded in any condition with or without back stamps. I just do not want any paper loss, please. If you have any of the below 4 for sale, will you please send me a pm.  Thanks! Scott

Delicate Aromatic
Immensely Popular
Just Right
Mais Paper Wrapper
Best of luck closing out the run.
Hey Scott. I finished the run a few years ago. Looks like you and I ended up in exactly the same place towards the end! I'll keep my out. DA was far and away the hardest to find for me.

[quote name="conor912" post=2265454]Hey Scott. I finished the run a few years ago. Looks like you and I ended up in exactly the same place towards the end! I'll keep my out. DA was far and away the hardest to find for me.[/QUOTE]

Congratulations on finishing the run! I appreciate you watching for cards as well. Have a good one. Scott

When I did my back run I remember the Just Right back being the most difficult for me. 

From my previous collection..

[IMG]https://luckeycards.com/pt212backsmaster.jpg[/IMG]
"Just Right" only comes on two player's backs, Kusel and one other that escapes me right now(have to dig out my notes).
Of the four listed Mais Paper Wrapper is the easiest, the Delicate Aromatic and Immensely Popular about the same and then the Just Right.

[quote name="Leon" post=2265902]When I did my back run I remember the Just Right back being the most difficult for me. 

From my previous collection..

[IMG]https://luckeycards.com/pt212backsmaster.jpg[/IMG][/QUOTE]

Awesome-thanks for sharing!

[quote name="sb1" post=2265992]Of the four listed Mais Paper Wrapper is the easiest, the Delicate Aromatic and Immensely Popular about the same and then the Just Right.[/QUOTE]

Thanks for the info-I’m finding them all equally hard to find. Lol. And yes I do recall hearing about the only 2 subjects for Just Right. The hunt continues!

[quote name="sb1" post=2265988]"Just Right" only comes on two player's backs, Kusel and one other that escapes me right now(have to dig out my notes).[/QUOTE]

The other subject is Browning.

[quote name="edhans" post=2266756]The other subject is Browning.[/QUOTE]

Thanks

I got "Just Right" in February of this year from a board member, but still looking for, Delicate Aromatic, Immensely Popular and Mais Paper Wrapper. It's a fun chase, but these last few are not coming easy. Good Luck! I still have to add "They Please" and "Just Right" to the below composite.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=535540&d=1664001325[/IMG]

Nice pic! Funny we are basically stuck in the same spot. We can create a support group or something. Lol. Happy for you that you picked up Just Right.
